00035 #include <QPixmap>

00039 
00040 class KviHtmlDialogData
00041 {
00042 public:
00043         KviHtmlDialogData() {
00044                 m_pDoc=new QTextDocument();
00045         };
00046         ~KviHtmlDialogData(){delete m_pDoc;};
00047 
00048         void addImageResource(const QString &key,const QPixmap &pix)
00049         {
00050                 if (!m_pDoc) m_pDoc=new QTextDocument();
00051                 QUrl url;
00052                 url.setPath(key);
00053                 m_pDoc->addResource(2,url,pix);
00054         }
00055 
00056         void addHtmlResource(const QString key,const QString value)
00057         {
00058                 htmlResource.insert(key,value);
00059         }
00060 
00061         // input
00062 
00063         // mandatory fields
00064         enum Flags { ForceMinimumSize = 1 };
00065         int iFlags;               // da flags :)
00066         int iDefaultButton;       // the button to use when Enter is pressed (1,2 or 3)
00067         int iCancelButton;        // the button to use when Esc is pressed (1,2 or 3)
00068         QString szHtmlText;       // Shouldn't be empty :D
00069 
00070         // optional fields
00071         QString szCaption;        // KVIrc is used when this is empty
00072         QString szUpperLabelText; // no label is shown if this is empty
00073         QString szLowerLabelText; // no label is shown if this is empty
00074         QString szButton1Text;    // OK is used if this is empty
00075         QString szButton2Text;    // no button is shown if this is empty
00076         QString szButton3Text;    // no button is shown if this is empty
00077         QTextDocument *m_pDoc;
00078         QHash<QString,QString> htmlResource;
00079         int iMinimumWidth;
00080         int iMinimumHeight;
00081 
00082         QPixmap pixIcon;          // may be null
00083 
00084         // output
00085         int iSelectedButton;      // returns 1,2 or 3
00086 };
00087 
00088 class KviTextBrowser: public QTextBrowser
00089 {
00090 public:
00091         KviTextBrowser(QWidget *par,KviHtmlDialogData *ht)
00092                 : QTextBrowser(par), m_pHt(ht){};
00093         ~KviTextBrowser(){};
00094         virtual QVariant loadResource ( int type, const QUrl & name )
00095         {
00096                 QString p=m_pHt->htmlResource.value(name.path());
00097                 qDebug("resource %s type %d and page %s",name.path().toUtf8().data(),type,p.toUtf8().data());
00098                 if (!p.isEmpty()) return QVariant(p);
00099                 else return QVariant();
00100 
00101 
00102                 //return QTextBrowser::loadResource(type,name);
00103         }
00104 protected:
00105         KviHtmlDialogData *m_pHt;
00106 
00107 };
00108 
00109 class KVIRC_API KviHtmlDialog : public QDialog
00110 {
00111         Q_OBJECT
00112 public:
00113         // the dialog does NOT delete this structure and assumes that
00114         // it remains alive until the dialog closes (i.e. it may access
00115         // the structure in the destructor
00116         KviHtmlDialog(QWidget * pParent,KviHtmlDialogData * pData);
00117         ~KviHtmlDialog();
00118 protected:
00119         KviHtmlDialogData * m_pData;
00120 public:
00121         // displays the dialog as modal and returns 1,2 or 3
00122         static int display(QWidget * pParent,KviHtmlDialogData * pData);
00123 protected slots:
00124         void button1Pressed();
00125         void button2Pressed();
00126         void button3Pressed();
00127 protected:
00128         virtual void reject();
00129 };
